seg.source: 洛杉矶中央图书馆的惊艳结构先睹为快
seg.translation: Take a look of the astounding architecture of the Los Angeles Central Library
The stunning structure of the Los Angeles Central Library
A sneak peek at the stunning architecture of the Los Angeles Central Library

seg.source: 美国建筑史学家学会南加利福尼亚洲分会与新书《洛杉矶中央博物馆：其艺术与建筑历史》的作者阿诺·斯瓦茨曼和史蒂芬·吉举办了一场沙龙。观众们可通过此次活动进一步了解市中心中央图书馆的历史。
seg.translation: A salon will be hosted by Southern California Branch of Society of Architectural Historians and the co-authors of Los Angles Central Museum: Art and Architectural History, Arnold Schwarzman and Stephen Gee. It will deliver more knowledge of the Central Library to the participants.

The Southern California branch of the American Institute of Architectural Historians has held a salon with 阿诺·斯瓦茨曼 and 史蒂芬·吉, author of the Los Angeles Central Museum: its art and architectural history. Through this event, viewers can learn more about the history of Central Library in the city centre.

The Southern California chapter of the American Society of Architectural Historians and the authors of a new book, "Los Angeles Central Museum: Its Art and Architectural History," Arnold Schwartzman and Steven Gee, hosted a salon at which viewers learned more about the history of the Central Library in the city center.

seg.source: 吉和斯瓦茨曼将讨论并分享1926年贝特伦·古德西的设计图片以及1933年哈迪・霍尔兹曼・弗夫尔事务所的修复与扩建图片。
seg.translation: Gee and Schwarzman will discuss and share images of design by Bertram Goodhue in 1926 and restoration and expansion of Hardy Holzman Pfeiffer Associates in 1933.
Gillette and Swatzman will discuss and share images of the 1926 贝特伦·古德西 Design and the restoration and expansion of the 哈迪·霍尔兹曼·弗夫尔 office in 1933.
Guy and Swartzman will discuss and share the design of Bertram Goodsey in 1926 and the restoration and expansion of the Hardy Holzman Favre office in 1933.

seg.source: 此次沙龙的时间为：8月21日下午2点至4点，地点：Salle Moderne，Art Deco Southwestern School of Law（前Bullocks Wilshire)，3050 Wilshire Blvd。
seg.translation: The salon hours are: 2pm to 4pm, August 21. Address: Salle Moderne, Art Deco Southwestern School of Law (formerly Bullocks Wilshire), 3050 Wilshire Blvd.
The salon's time is: August 21 2 o'clock in the afternoon to 4 points, location: Salle Moderne, Art Deco Southwestern School of the (former Bullocks Wilshire), $number Wilshire Blvd.
The salon will be held from 2 to 4 p.m. on 21 August at Salle Modern, Art Deco Southern School of Law (formerly Bullocks Wilshire), 3050 Wilshire Blvd.

seg.source: 参加者可以参观中央大厅、时代展室、仙人掌休息室和茶室。
seg.translation: Visitors can visit the venues of the central hall, the history exhibit, the cactus lounge, and the tea lounge.
Participants can visit the central hall, the time room, the Cactus Lounge and the teahouse.
Participants can visit the Central Lobby, the Times Room, the Cactus Lounge and the Tea Room.

seg.source: 需要提前订票；SAHSCC会员：15美元；非会员：25美元。
seg.translation: Advance ticket reservation required; SAHSCC members: US$15; non-members: US$25.
Advance booking is required; SAHSCC member: USD 15; Non-member: $25.
Advance reservations are required; SAHSCC members: $15; non-members: $25.

seg.source: DTLA的开放式工厂阁楼进行了一次舒适的改造。
seg.translation: A comfortable makeover was provided to the open factory building design of DTLA.
DTLA's Open factory loft has a comfortable makeover.
DTLA's open-plan factory loft has undergone a comfortable makeover.

seg.source: 庆祝洛杉矶中央图书馆90周年以及新书的发售
seg.translation: Celebrating the 90th anniversary of the Los Angeles Central Library and sale of new book
Celebrating the 90 anniversary of the Los Angeles Central Library and the sale of new books
Celebrating the 90th anniversary of the Los Angeles Central Library and the release of new books
